name: Ordos - Order & Chaos
description:
👾

❗  This game is in ALPHA, it's nowhere near complete yet ❗ 
This was made for a college project, but I will be updating this since I really liked working on this project.

🐲 Ordos is an Ace Combat/Drakengard/StarFox inspired flying game, and I had a lot of fun making it, and I hope you have fun playing my game.

If you want to learn more about my game, like how to play and controls , view my blog to get updates on the development of the game and more information about it!

ordoschaos.wordpress.com

---

🏃 Running the game 🏃

Windows: ✔️ This game is supported for Windows.

Itch.io app:  ✔️ This game is supported on the Itch.io app.

WebGL: ❔ This may be available to play through webGL soon.

Linux: ❌ This game isn't supported for Linux yet. 😔

MacOS: ❌ This game isn't supported for MacOS yet. 😔
